website_summaries.verdict: An easy to use dual purpose call.
pros: Just inhale or exhale to get the noises out of this call
Two-in-one call will draw both doe and buck with bleats and grunts
Includes a small compass and lanyard
cons: This call is not as heavy-duty as other calls on the market

customer_reviews.title: Nice Call
customer_reviews.text: This is a great call! First time out with it I called in two decent sized bucks. Glad I added it to my arsenal. Only problem I have with it is the plastic ribbed part of the call can slip off fairly easily and I have had it come off in my pack while taking it out once up in the stand. If it wasn't for that 5/5. It is an easy fix for me though I just added a single drop of super glue to it and it hasn't moved since but I still could take it off if I had to which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: TheOcho_29

customer_reviews.title: Find another one that doesn't have the major condensation problems.
customer_reviews.text: Solid materials and good sound... when dry. But this gets bogged by condensation and then ice way too quickly. Then you end up with no sound, or worse - horrible sounds.
customer_reviews.author: MontanaClan

customer_reviews.title: Best call i've used.
customer_reviews.text: I love this grunt call. It's the second one isle bought in the last 18yrs. The sound is great and it works extremely well. The deer respond to this call.
customer_reviews.author: Jody S.

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong with primo
customer_reviews.text: Bring the game in, called both bucks and does in close. Can’t go wrong with primo
customer_reviews.author: Hawaiian bow hunter

customer_reviews.title: Missing compass, otherwise great
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this was great but mine was missing the compass as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Gary and Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Hard and cumbersome to use especially when the buck is in the area. I would much rather use the Extinguisher for an extra ten bucks.
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: The only bad was when it get moist it won’t work right
customer_reviews.author: Frankie L.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite caller
customer_reviews.text: It is a great product, it brings your compass and also you can change the sound by opening it, it brings a league that when changing its position you can make a sound of trophy buck, doe or fawn.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Mine didn't come with the compass but otherwise it's a solid product.
customer_reviews.author: Devin Beardsley

customer_reviews.title: Works good but seems to build up moisture causing the grunt ...
customer_reviews.text: Works good but seems to build up moisture causing the grunt to occasionally sound like a goose. I used it in the snow here in mn and did call in nice buck with the bleat. Simple to use otherwise just watched youtube to get calls down pat.4 star cause I feel it may scare a deer if not constantly cleaned out.
customer_reviews.author: adam

customer_reviews.title: Call stops working in cold temps on the doe call side.
customer_reviews.text: I think it is easy to adjust and I like to have Buck and doe calls all in one for convenience but I had a big problem with it freezing up on me on the doe call side a few times right when I had deer in the area and was not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome !
customer_reviews.text: Bought this call for my daughter. First time it was used she pulled in a nice 6 point pre-rut.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: cheap product...low quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item.....first time I used it broke....I would not recommend this product....
customer_reviews.author: Mark P

customer_reviews.title: Great Grunt Call
customer_reviews.text: I have never had any luck grunt calling bucks in. First two days I used this call, I called in a buck for my wife. Her first buck. Then I called in another buck the next morning. Great call
customer_reviews.author: Dallas Pauline

customer_reviews.title: Good call
customer_reviews.text: Good call good sounds malfunctions in really cold weather but a lot of things malfunction in really cold weather.
customer_reviews.author: jong

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Terrible call It sounds shaky and not real at all
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Great product & great price
customer_reviews.text: Yes it was exactly as expected great product for a awesome price
customer_reviews.author: Joel Watkins

customer_reviews.title: No compass on the front
customer_reviews.text: I was annoyed that it didn’t come with a compass on the front like the other videos/pictures
customer_reviews.author: Juan M

customer_reviews.title: Probably good
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, haven’t been able to call a deer in with it yet. Next season!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great call, my avid hunter brother loves it and said that he would buy another!
customer_reviews.author: Becha H

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and works
customer_reviews.text: Don't know if it really calls in deer, but my 6 year old daughter asked for one for her birthday and this has held up to her and her 7 year old brother's use, just fine
customer_reviews.author: RLSK

customer_reviews.title: Good call there are nicer but this one works well
customer_reviews.text: Nice call, can make both buck and doe calls. It did it's part last year, I didn't do mine:)
customer_reviews.author: samurai

customer_reviews.title: No compass as written on description.
customer_reviews.text: This was supposed to have a compass it came and there is not one on it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its a good caller...all the sounds are good..it works well.I recommend this for any deer hunter...
customer_reviews.author: Marcus R.

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Works and sounds great, would definitly buy again and would recommend to a friend or family member. Has multi tone reed.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: This item fell apart about the second time I went to adjust it and now it sounds like a dying animal. Very cheap.
customer_reviews.author: NICK DAVIS

customer_reviews.title: Decent call.
customer_reviews.text: With this call you can inhale or exhale giving you two adjustable calls in one. Problem is that the inhale call really doesn't work all that well. The exhale call seems pretty good, haven't hunted with it yet but it sounds good. The inhale is okay for grunts but none of the doe calls were anywhere near as realistic as on the exhale side. Common to most calls, but the reed is fragile and the adjustment feature means you'll handle it and have a pretty high chance of making this useless if you bend the reed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working during a hunt
customer_reviews.text: I tried to entice a doe that was bedded down with this call. I am not sure if she even heard me. It wasn't even freezing outside and this call stopped working. The reeds seem cheap. It made a nice sound right up until it stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Bauman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: I am new to Hunting but this call is the first one I've had and havent used it yet but seems excellent it is literally like 8 to 9 calls in 1. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This is not a good product. The Construction is not very good, and the instructions would have been better written in Chinese, they make no sense at all. I tried their website, and that wasn't any help. My suggestion: rely on deer scent, and not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: awesome!

customer_reviews.title: Pitiful Chinese product
customer_reviews.text: The compass got me lost, The compass got me lost, hi ho the dario The compass got me lost...where am I anyway!?!?!
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best all in one I've ever had.
customer_reviews.text: Decent cheap all in one deer call. Not the best but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: MoCityOwen

product_meta.title: Primos Power Buck and Doe Call
product_meta.description: This call allows you to bleat and grunt using just one call. The Power Buck & Doe's dual reed assembly for inhale-exhale operation produces the throaty grunts and clicking tones of aggressive bucks and Estrus Bleats and cries of does. It includes a built-in compass. Features: - Dual-reed assembly for inhale-exhale operation- Throaty grunts and clicking tones of aggressive bucks to Estrus Bleats and cries of does- Single and double-reed options, all-in-one call- Includes built-in compass
feature_bullets: Crafted from the highest quality material ensuring quality and durability
Made in the U. S. A.
Throaty grunts and clicking tones of aggressive bucks to Estrus Bleats and cries of does
Single and double-reed options, all-in-one call
